======================================== DASHBOARD TEST SUMMARY ========================================
✅ WORKING: - Authentication and session persistence - Dashboard page rendering - Intelligence page rendering - Navigation between pages - UI components (buttons, cards, inputs) - User menu (Clerk integration)
⚠️ NEEDS CONFIGURATION: - API endpoints (need backend services) - Database connection (Supabase) - Gmail integration - Anthropic/Claude API
📊 RECOMMENDATIONS: 1. Configure environment variables for all services 2. Set up database schema and seed data 3. Implement API error handling 4. Add loading states for better UX ========================================
